thread.section_title: Hotel Fabric - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!
thread.title_full: Excellent! - Review of Hotel Fabric, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Britzillian
title: Excellent!
text:
I have stayed at Hotel Fabric three times since December 2016 and am booked for another two stays in March and April 2017.
The hotel is lovely.
Very well located, with a few metro stations close by.
The rooms are great with very comfortable beds and great bathrooms.
The highlight is the continental breakfast. Really nice.
Friendly and helpful staff.
Highly recommended.
